about.server: 1 Block producer and 2 Relays Each on separate nodes - CPU: 4v Cores per node, RAM: 8GB per node, HD: 80GB NVME per node, Bandwidth: 1 Gbps per node
about.company: At LEAD we believe that stake pool operators should help and communicate with current and potential delegators as much as possible. All rewards earned will currently remain in the pool to increase pledge amount. Helping to LEAD the way to a decentralised future
